definition: A MentalRepresentation that encodes information as a structured symbolic expression, such as a logical formula, program fragment, or algebraic term, with discrete components and relations.

positive_examples: The system represents the rule as a logical formula with quantifiers and predicates.
It encodes a program as an abstract syntax tree.
She thinks of the argument as a structured expression with premises and conclusion.
negative_examples: It uses a dense vector embedding with no discrete structure.
He has only a vague intuitive sense, not a symbolic representation.
The system stores a raw text string without parsing its structure.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not any representation; specifically discrete, structured, symbol-level expressions.
